item.title: Stitch Playing Guitar

item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Stitch Playing Guitar

Rocklove X Disney

One of a collection of Lilo & Stitch officially licensed jewelry I did. Designed by Rocklove in collaboration with Disney. I happen to be a guitarist myself, so this one was easily a favorite of mine.

Software: Zbrush
Client: Disney, Rocklove

item.content:encoded:
Chasm Skull Ring

Intenebris

This is a ring I sculpted for my brand back in 2016. It was inspired by H.R. Giger – one of my favorite bio-mechanical dark artists.

Software: Zbrush, Rhinoceros 3D, Matrix

Client: Intenebris

item.title: Stanislav Krawczyk Skull Ring
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Stanislav Krawczyk Skull Ring

Intenebris X Stanislav Krawczyk

This is another fun and highly experimental artist collaborations. Stan is a well known Ukrainian dark artist with cerebral palsy. His condition left him entirely paralyzed on one side of his body since an early age, as well as mostly blind. Despite that, he uses what mobility and vision he has to create deeply expressive scratchy pen drawings depicting what his life experience – each one with the same title – “Pain”. The 3D model is not shown here, because honestly, it’s ugly. This was purely experimental, and was always intended to be hand finished and seen exactly the way it looks in these photos.

Software: Zbrush
Client: Intenebris, Stanislav Krawczyk

item.title: Vincent Castiglia “The Sleep” Necklace
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Vincent Castiglia “The Sleep” Necklace

Intenebris X Vincent Castiglia

This is one of my more proud accomplishments. Vincent Castiglia is a world renowned tattoo artist and painter. I was fortunate enough that he agreed to 3 signature pieces of jewelry, based on 3 of his most well known pieces. The Sleep was the first of these. I also went on to create 12″ tall limited edition sculptures of these pieces as well (pictured last). This was one of my earliest highly technical projects and was tremendously helpful in getting my brand recognized in the fashion and art worlds. I would go on to collaborate with more artists because of this piece.

Software: Zbrush, Rhinoceros 3D, Matrix, Formlabs Form 3 3D Printer
Client: Intenebris, Vincent Castiglia

item.title: Fractured Skull Necklace
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Fractured Skull Necklace

Intenebris

A necklace depicting a broken skull. I was doing an anatomical study originally, and ended up liking how it looked for a jewelry piece. So I modified and stylized it, and released it.

Software: Zbrush
Client: Intenebris
